text:
The touch task currently supports a File attribute, which may or may not exist, 
and nested FileSets, whose components, by definition, exist.  The behavior of 
the Unix touch command would be more faithfully modeled if nested FileLists 
were also permitted, as this would provide support for touching several 
possibly nonexistent files with one task invocation.
creator: mbenson@apache.org
mbenson@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 8399
patch for the manual page

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text: Can I interest any committers in this minor but useful enhancement for 1.6.1? ;)

creator: mbenson@apache.org

<touch> task... ;)

The reason I didn't hit the tests is that there were no existing tests for
